Description:
When users are in Microsoft Word, Excel, or PowerPoint apps, and they want to share a file that is saved locally in their device (not stored in a cloud location), the new Outlook for Windows will show up as a share target and they will be able to easily email the file. #newoutlookforwindows.
GA date: September CY2025
Title: Outlook: Sharing Word, Excel, and PowerPoint local files through the new Outlook for Windows
